name: Skull of the senses
description:
As inhabitant of the deep you must use your senses and your magic skull to go in search of treasure. Walk along the labyrinthine paths, use your wits and find different ways to find the treasure in the fewest days possible

-------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls in the menu:

*Controller:

X to accept.

*Keyboard:

 K to accept.

w, up, s, down to change options   

*Mouse:

Click to accept.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

* See tutorial option to know how to play and the controls within the game *

*This is a game made in a short period of time to experiment and learn. You may find bugs.*
